data.approach: Create a SendToLLM component with text selection detection, instruction input, LLM routing dropdown (save to task notes or create file), and integrate next to the Copy button in SessionCard. Component will use the existing llmService.ts for API calls.

suggestedTasks.title: Create LLM Text Selector Component
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a reusable Svelte component that allows text selection and LLM interaction. The component should:
- Support text selection from terminal outputs
- Include a 4-line text input for user instructions
- Provide flexible routing options for LLM results
- Handle result storage in task notes or markdown file
- Include hover/dropdown submit options
suggestedTasks.reason: Implement core functionality outlined in task description

suggestedTasks.title: Design LLM Result Routing Strategy
suggestedTasks.description:
Create a flexible mechanism for routing LLM results to different storage locations. Define clear interfaces and methods for:
- Appending results to task.NOTES
- Creating result.md files
- Handling different result storage scenarios
- Implementing user-configurable routing options

gotchas: Ensure component is modular and reusable
